item.title: Batons, Bevs and Baked Potatoes
item.author: Christopher Thomas,Anna Lawson,
item.description: Some say that it’s the most prestigious and largest event known to Imperial’s Cross Country and Athletics society, others say that it’s merely a warm-up jog in preparation for a night of serious shape-throwing in the beloved Metric. Either way, it’s left undeniable that the Hyde Park Relays of 2016 …
